name: Blood Sunset
description:
Blood Sunset is an open-world, post-apocalyptic, survival RPG. You happen to find yourself on old deserted islands... full of zombies. You'll have to survive, kill, run away, get food, and resources.

Hunger, thirst, and death are the challenges you'll have to overcome.

Features:

*Driving cars
*Lots of zombies
*Friendly and enemy camps
*Building camps
*Big islands
*Hunting animals
*Crafting
*Points of interest with great resources, and with great danger!
*Gardening and farming with stages of growing plants
*Lots and lots of zombies
*Dive underwater and explore the depths to find more resources.
*Photo mode - create beautiful photos by pressing the L and K button

Your main goal is to survive!
